title: Phlorest phylogeny derived from Lee & Hasegawa 2011 'Bayesian phylogenetic analysis supports an agricultural origin of Japonic languages'
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Lee S, Hasegawa T (2011) Bayesian phylogenetic analysis supports an agricultural origin of Japonic languages. Proceedings of the Royal Society B: Biological Sciences, 278(1725):3662–9.
